attributes.action: Make slander and defamation of a deceased person a criminal offence.
attributes.additional_details:
Especially in any form of media (including social). This should be considered posthumous defamation and/slander.  

While the deceased fails to be affected by this practice, the privacy, reputation, health, and income of any estate, family, business associates or friends associated with the deceased is unjustly affected. 

This is also the case of a person of public interest, where there is potential to cause distress, mental health issues and physical harm.
attributes.background: This is a petition to create a law that would make it illegal for anyone/any organisation to falsely, directly label any deceased individual as a criminal having commited any criminal act while alive, until such time as they are posthumously proven guilty in a court of law.
